  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.core.dao.hibernate.HibernateDao<BatchClass>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheableDao<BatchClass>, Dao<BatchClass>, BatchClassDao

public class BatchClassDaoImpl
extends HibernateDao<BatchClass>
implements BatchClassDao
